extDescription.message: Pearltrees lets you organize all your interests.

goToOnePealtree.message: Go to one of my collections
goToOnePealtree.description: Link to one of your pearltrees

pearlThisPageIn.description: Link to pearl this page directly

goToPearlThisPage.description: Link to switch to pearl this page UI

chooseParentTitle.description: Pearl this page in a new pearltree

premExp.message: Your Premium membership has expired. Go premium again to modify your private collections and make Pearltrees your own.

treeFull.message: Your collection has reached 250 items, move them into sub-collections or create a new one to add more content.

discoverPremium.message: Become a premium member and to make Pearltrees your own.

installOKTitle.message: Your web clipper is successfully installed.

installOKClose.message: Click here to close this page.

installOKTitleIpad.message:
You have successfully installed
the web clipper on your iPad.

When you find a page you like,
click on the web clipper and put it directly
where you want in your account.
installOKTitleIpad.description: Title for successful install on ipad

installOKCloseIpad.message: or tap here to continue in Safari
installOKCloseIpad.description: close after successful install op ipad

loginHeader.message: Already have an account? Please log in

newPearltreePrivateNotPremium.description: New pearltree's private checkbox not premium

newPearltreePrivateDone.message: @item@ is in your new private collection.

newPearltreeDiscoverPremium.message: Become a premium member to make this collection private.

pearled.message: Your @item@ is in one of your collections.

privatePearled.message: Your @item@ is in one of your private collections.

helpFirstTimeDescription.message: Done! Your web clipper is activated. Now, you can add the pages you find while browsing.

helpUnpearlableDescription.message: Go browse the web and when you come across a page you like, use the Pearltrees web clipper to add it to one of your collections.

errorUnavailable.message: Pearltrees is currently unavailable. Please retry later.

errorSafariCookies.message:
You can't connect to the web clipper with your current Safari settings.
You can either log in to pearltrees.com or change your settings in Safari.
Open the Safari menu, click on preferences, then on privacy and select never block cookies.

errorSafariWindowsCookies.message:
You can't connect to the web clipper with your current Safari settings.
You can reset them in the Safari menu: click on preferences, then on privacy and select never block cookies.

errorCookies.message: Please enable cookies to use the web clipper.

errorServer.message: The Pearltrees server sent an invalid response. If the problem persists, please install the latest version of the web clipper, or send a mail to contact@pearltrees.com

errorIsNotOwner.message: The collection has been given to someone else.

pearledInNewTree.message: Done! @item@ is in your new collection.

buttonConfigDescription.message: The hover button lets you pick what you find interesting inside a page. Show it on:

buttonConfigBottomDescription.message: Your new settings have been saved. Restart your browser or open a new tab to apply them.

chromePermissionTitle.message: Do more with your Pearltrees web clipper!

chromePermissionDescription.message: Update your web clipper to add things you find interesting inside a web page: images, videos or text.

chromePermissionTitleNewInstall.message: Welcome to the Pearltrees web clipper!

chromePermissionDescriptionNewInstall.message: Confirm permissions to be able to directly add what you find interesting inside a page: image, video or text.

chromePermissionDismissMessage.message: If you want you can update your web clipper

excludedSite.message: Oops! This web page's address is not valid.
excludedSite.description: Oops! This web page's address is not valid.

invalidImage.message: Oops! This image is too large. Maximum dimensions are 10,000 x 10,000.
invalidImage.description: Oops! This image is too large. Maximum dimensions are 10,000 x 10,000.

chromePermissionPopup.message:
Your web clipper is updated!
Restart your browser to add things you find interesting inside a web page: images, videos or text.

chromePermissionPopupNewInstall.message:
Your web clipper has been updated successfully!
Restart your browser or open a new tab to enjoy the improvements.

directButtonActivationPopup.message:
The hover button is now enabled!
Restart your browser or open a new tab to use it.

gaugeFull.message: You've added a lot of items and your account is now full. Go Premium to get more storage.

gaugeFullPremium.message: You've added a lot of items and your account is now full. Upgrade to get more storage.
